question: I do have a good friend but we're so different. I have many problems and can't do much in life while she has such a happy lifestyle and I feel envious and jealous towards her. What should I do?
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) advised us that in worldly matters,
we reflect on those that are inferior to us, for example, if we have a small
home, reflect on those who do not have shelter. If we are unhappy, ponder
upon those that are being consistently oppressed and brutally killed. By
adopting that attitude, we will be content with our conditions. Furthermore,
our faith is on Taqdeer.

Allah Ta'ala says in the Noble Qur'aan, 'Do people think we will leave the
believers saying we believe and do not test them.''(Ankaboot Aayat 1). One
of the reasons of the unfavourable conditions is being the test from Allah.
We should submit to the will of Allah Ta'ala and be patient, seek assistant
throught Salaat and Du'aa. Allah Ta'ala says, 'O you who believe! Seek
assistance through patience and Salaat.' (Baqarah)

May Almighty Allah Ta'ala grant you peace and contentment at heart, Aameen.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows
